creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: rounded beanie form, with open areas on crown; black main body with pink and red petal and leaf appliqués and nine metal Buddhas on one side; multi-colored lotus, floral and bird embroidery and appliqués on opposite side; scrolling element on crown with black and blue ground, floral embroidery and orange pompon; pink tassel on one side, green tassel on opposite side
dimension: 5 1/4 x 10 1/2 x 7 1/4 in. (13.34 x 26.67 x 18.42 cm) (without pompon or tassels)
title: Baby's hat
